ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RW_Unregistered_Broker_Name__c!=null, RW_Unregistered_Broker_Mobile__c!=null), RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c!=true, OR( ispickval(LeadSource, 'Channel Partner'), ispickval(LeadSource, 'Temp Channel Partner') ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Apply Unregistered Broker should be checked.
